Update Expressions¶

class mongoalchemy.query.UpdateExpression(query)¶
set(qfield, value)¶

$set - set a particular value

unset(qfield)¶
$unset - delete a particular value

Note

Requires server version >= 1.3.0+.

TODO: check version is >1.3.0

inc(qfield, value)¶

$inc - increment a particular field by a value

append(qfield, value)¶

$push - append a value to an array

extend(qfield, *value)¶

$pushAll - append several values to an array

remove(qfield, value)¶

$pull - remove a value(s) from an existing array

remove_all(qfield, *value)¶

$pullAll - remove several value(s) from an existing array

add_to_set(qfield, value)¶

$pullAll - remove several value(s) from an existing array

Note

Requires server version >= 1.3.0+.

TODO: check version > 1.3.3.

pop(qfield, value)¶

$addToSet - Adds value to the array only if its not in the array already. TODO: v1.1 only

atomic_list_op_multivalue(op, qfield, *value)¶
atomic_list_op(op, qfield, value)¶
atomic_op(op, qfield, value)¶
execute()¶
